backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing HTTP outcall functions to fetch external IP address, measure ping latency, retrieve geo-location info, and test download speed using multiple fallback API endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the satellite map column expansion feature (90% width on click) with references to App.tsx and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their roles in the three-column GPS tracking application with satellite map visualization.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color tokens for the igo satellite tracking theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with mobile-optimized meta tags and viewport settings for the igo live location tracking application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing a three-column collapsible layout with GPS tracking, trail visualization, distance calculation, and special 90/5/5 width distribution when satellite map column is expanded.
frontend/src/components/CoordinateDispla: Component displaying GPS coordinates, accuracy quality badges, movement metrics (speed/heading), and total distance traveled in a stacked card layout.
frontend/src/components/DeviceInfoDialog: Empty file placeholder for device information dialog component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright year, heart icon, and UTM-tracked link to caffeine.ai using the app's hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with satellite icon and igo branding, responsive for mobile and desktop viewports.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive canvas-based satellite map with Web Mercator projection, tile rendering, pan/zoom/pinch controls, GPS accuracy overlay, trail path visualization, and follow mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an actor instance for backend communication, automatically recreating it when the user's identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for managing user login/logout state, identity persistence, and authentication status throughout the React application.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook `useGeoInfo` that fetches geographic information from the backend actor with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens defining a teal/cyan satellite-inspired color palette for both light and dark themes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/geo.ts: Utility functions for Web Mercator projection calculations, converting between meters and pixels at different zoom levels and latitudes for GPS accuracy visualization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH values, custom fonts, animations, and plugins for the igo GPS project.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural notes, features, and pending feature request AR-1 to expand satellite map to 90% width when clicked.
